description.zh-cn: 中国文学翻译家。
description.en: Chinese literary translator.

description.zh-cn: 董秋斯的出生地，位于天津。
description.en: Dong Qiusi's birthplace, located in Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪初由四所美国及英国基督教教会联合在北京开办的大学。
description.en: A university in Beijing, China, that was formed out of the merger of four Christian colleges between the years 1919 and 1952.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军对抗北洋军阀的统一战争。
description.en: A military campaign launched by the National Revolutionary Army of the Kuomintang against the Beiyang government and other regional warlords.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党于1930年代在中国上海领导创建的文学组织。
description.en: A literary organization founded in Shanghai, China, in the 1930s under the leadership of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党于1930年代在中国上海领导创建的组织。
description.en: An organization founded in Shanghai, China, in the 1930s under the leadership of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国民主党派之一。
description.en: One of the democratic parties in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于上海市的翻译工作者组织。
description.en: An association for translators located in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 中国各民族作家自愿结合的专业性人民团体。
description.en: A professional people's organization formed voluntarily by writers of all ethnic groups in China.

description.zh-cn: 由人民文学出版社主办的文学期刊，主要刊登外国文学作品。
description.en: A literary journal sponsored by the People's Literature Publishing House, primarily publishing foreign literary works.

description.zh-cn: 查尔斯·狄更斯所著的小说。
description.en: A novel by Charles Dickens.

description.zh-cn: 俄国作家列夫·托尔斯泰所著的小说。
description.en: A novel by the Russian author Leo Tolstoy.

description.zh-cn: 董秋斯是天津静海人。
description.en: Dong Qiusi was from Jinghai, Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 1926年毕业于燕京大学哲学系。
description.en: Graduated from the Department of Philosophy at Yenching University in 1926.

description.zh-cn: 1926年底参加北伐战争，主编《血路》。
description.en: At the end of 1926, he participated in the Northern Expedition and served as the editor-in-chief of 'Xuelu'.

description.zh-cn: 1930年参与发起中国左翼作家联盟。
description.en: In 1930, he participated in the founding of the League of Left-Wing Writers.

description.zh-cn: 1930年参与发起中国社会科学家联盟。
description.en: In 1930, he participated in the founding of the League of Chinese Social Scientists.

description.zh-cn: 1945年参与组织中国民主促进会。
description.en: In 1945, he participated in organizing the China Association for Promoting Democracy.

description.zh-cn: 1945年参与组织中国民主促进会后，担任其机关刊物《民主》周刊的编委。
description.en: After participating in the organization of the China Association for Promoting Democracy in 1945, he served as an editorial board member of its official publication, the 'Democracy' weekly.

description.zh-cn: 1946年加入中国共产党。
description.en: Joined the Chinese Communist Party in 1946.

description.zh-cn: 1949年10月1日后，历任上海翻译工作者协会主席。
description.en: After October 1, 1949, he served as the chairman of the Shanghai Translators' Association.

description.zh-cn: 1949年10月1日后任中国作协编审，并于1952年正式加入协会。
description.en: After October 1, 1949, he served as an editor and reviewer for the China Writers Association, and formally joined the association in 1952.

description.zh-cn: 1949年10月1日后，历任《世界文学》副主编。
description.en: After October 1, 1949, he served as the deputy editor-in-chief of 'World Literature'.

description.zh-cn: 董秋斯翻译了小说《大卫·科波菲尔》。
description.en: Dong Qiusi translated the novel 'David Copperfield'.

description.zh-cn: 董秋斯翻译了小说《战争与和平》。
description.en: Dong Qiusi translated the novel 'War and Peace'.
